markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shining Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=165)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 560 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A piece of _shining ammunition_ gives off a faint glow. When shot, this ammunition sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 10 minutes. If it hits a target, it sticks, causing the target to shed light in the same radius. A creature can remove the ammunition with an Interact action, but the ammunition itself continues to glow for the rest of the duration or until destroyed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shining Ammunition
